discourse_list.title: Hayden doing TikTok dances for Uniswap marketing

content.content: I believe that DeFi is the most egalitarian thing we’ve ever seen. It’s insanely ambitious, and it can really reshape the fabric of society. For the promotion of DeFi and Uniswap’s brand awareness, I think that Uniswap DAO should start focussing on promoting across platforms such as TikTok, Tiktok has over 1 billion users and has been downloaded over 200 million times in the United States alone. IMO, Hayden Adams; Inventor of the Uniswap Protocol would be the perfect person for creating brand awareness. To get a rough opinion of the community, I’m creating a poll. Vote on “Yes” - if you support hayden doing tiktok dances for UniSwap marketing, Vote on “No” - if you don’t support Hayden doing tiktok dances. Should Hayden do TikTok dances for Uniswap marketing?     Yes No     0 voters
content.GPT-summary: The post suggests that Uniswap DAO should promote their brand awareness on TikTok, and proposes that Hayden Adams, the inventor of the Uniswap Protocol, should create brand awareness by doing TikTok dances. The author is seeking feedback from the community by creating a poll. The post also explains the potential benefits of promoting on TikTok and highlights the importance of DeFi.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party or author is advertising proposal
Author of proposal is explaining proposal
